OMG the place and ONLY place to go for lunch!  If you are near here you just found your lunch spot for the entire duration of your stay, their LUNCH menu changes DAILY!  I went there 3 times in a row consecutively and everyday was a different menu.  Try and get a lunch reservation otherwise you'll be sitting in bar area or facing a wall.  Their food is so ... godly great, you just have to experience this.  Top quality meats, drool worthy sauces... I could just go on and on.  Their lunch price is just $15 EUR/ person including either 1 bottled water/ fizz water/ beer/ wine for FREE!! Only restaurant I know that does this, this place gets packed fast!  And mostly locals dine here so you know it's good!
